bug.summary: 3.0 linux eclipse tutorial points to 2.4 libs
bug.description:
Transferred from <denchmark-link:http://code.opencv.org/issues/4365>http://code.opencv.org/issues/4365</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>|| be rak on 2015-05-28 11:21 || Priority: Low || Affected: branch 'master' (3.0-dev) || Category: documentation || Tracker: Bug || Difficulty: Easy || PR: || Platform: Any / Any </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>3.0 linux eclipse tutorial points to 2.4 libs</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>http://docs.opencv.org/ref/master/d7/d16/tutorial_linux_eclipse.html
it's still the verbatim 2.4 version. -lopencv_videoio -lopencv_imgcodecs are missing, -lopencv_legacy -lopencv_contrib should be removed. </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>History</denchmark-h>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/mshabunin>@mshabunin</denchmark-link> : Can be closed.
